p: This misstep or honest mistake proved hazardous for the public. Hydroxycloroquine is inexpensive, easily available in malaria-endemic regions, and became highly sought after following its publicity on several media platforms. It disappeared from the market like a ghost, prices skyrocketed, and vendors started stocking up on it. This created a supply chain deficit and its shortage left a profound impact on people using it as a management for their autoimmune diseases. Healthcare providers noted increased number of lupus disease flare ups and a spike in rheumatoid arthritis cases.
